text: The National Society of Film Critics (NSFC) is an organization of film critics. The society gives out annual awards. The awards are very competitive. There are 60 members from newspapers and other media. The society also publishes books and articles. == Annual film award categories == * Best Film * Best Director * Best Actor * Best Actress * Best Supporting Actor * Best Supporting Actress * Best Screenplay * Best Cinematography * Best Foreign Language Film * Best Non-Fiction Film Category:Movie critics
title: National Society of Film Critics
